original_title: Jérôme Bosch, le diable aux ailes d'ange
overview: An artist with an exuberant imagination, a painter of the most extraordinay gardens and terrifying hells, a respected public figure of Hertogenbosch, and a man of faith – Hieronymus Bosch is certainly the most fascinating and mysterious artist of the Renaissance.
title: Hieronymus Bosch: The Devil with Angel’s Wings
